alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden and southwestern Leon Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway, Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Lake Talquin, Andrew, Bragg Stadium, Fort Braden, Leon County Civic Center, Kleman Plaza, Bloxham, Innovation Park, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Mission San Luis and Brown House. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
